purpleculture_pinyin:
pāo
to throw; to toss; to fling; to cast; to abandon
бросать; бросать; кинуть; транслировать; отказаться
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 抛)
Pictophonetic: 付 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
拋棄 [ pāo qì ]: to abandon; to discard; to renounce; to dump (sb)
拋售 [ pāo shòu ]: to dump (selling abroad more cheaply than cost price at home)
拋荒 [ pāo huāng ]: to lie idle (of arable land); fig. rusty because of lack of practice
拋錨 [ pāo máo ]: to drop anchor; to break down (of a car etc)
拋擲 [ pāo zhì ]: to throw; to cast
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • ⿺ Surround from lower left
      • 尢 [ yóu ] weak, lame
      • 力 [ lì ] strength, power; capability, influence
heisig_chinese_memo: The frankenbowser loves when you pick it up with your fingers and use all of your muscle to toss it!
Ru_trainchinese: pāo: (глаг) бросать, кидать; оставлять, покидать; показывать(ся); продавать в большом количестве и по низким ценам
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Even if you only have nine fingers, you still have the muscle to toss a baseball.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " hand " and " 𡯄 ", the original meaning is to discard and put aside. "Shu Wen Xin Fu": "Abandon Ye. From the hand from You Congli. Or from the hand, 𡯄 sound." The guest reporters all fled in desperation and were pardoned."

" Toss " can mean toss. Hou Shu Ouyang Jiong (He Mingchao): "After reminiscing in the past, I just tossed the red beans with my bare hands."

" Throwing " also means swaying. "Jin Ping Mei Ci Hua" Chapter 38: "I put on my cheeks and cast tears."

" Throwing " also means exposure. "The Romance of the Gods" Chapter 3: "Showing up and throwing his head, the corpse is cruel."

" Throw " is also used as a quantifier. "The Scholars" Chapter 3: "Like you, a sharp-mouthed monkey cheek, you should also take a picture of yourself by throwing urine!"
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " hand " and " 𡯄 ", the original meaning is to discard and put aside.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「𡯄」聲，本義為丟棄、撇開。《說文新附》：「棄也。从手从尤从力。或从手，𡯄聲。」《後漢書‧安成孝侯賜傳》：「賜與顯子信賣田宅，同拋財產，結客報吏，皆亡命逃伏，遭赦歸。」

　　「拋」可表示投擲。後蜀歐陽炯〈賀明朝〉：「憶昔花間相見後，只憑纖手，暗拋紅豆。」

　　「拋」也表示揮灑。《金瓶梅詞話》第38回：「我着香腮，拋下珠淚來。」

　　「拋」還表示暴露。《封神演義》第3回：「露面拋頭，尸骸殘暴。」

　　「拋」還用作量詞。《儒林外史》第3回：「像你這尖嘴猴腮，也該撒拋尿自己照照！」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「𡯄」聲，本義為丟棄、撇開。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
拋 (Simplified: 抛)
Pinyin: pāo
English Definition: to throw; to toss; to fling; to cast; to abandon
Total strokes: 8; Radical: 手
Pictophonetic: 付 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • ⿺ Surround from lower left
      • 尢 [ yóu ] weak, lame
      • 力 [ lì ] strength, power; capability, influence
Example Words:
拋棄 [ pāo qì ]: to abandon; to discard; to renounce; to dump (sb)
拋售 [ pāo shòu ]: to dump (selling abroad more cheaply than cost price at home)
拋荒 [ pāo huāng ]: to lie idle (of arable land); fig. rusty because of lack of practice
拋錨 [ pāo máo ]: to drop anchor; to break down (of a car etc)
拋擲 [ pāo zhì ]: to throw; to cast
More: 拋* | *拋 | *拋*

(Simplified: 抛)
Pictophonetic: 付 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 6
Chinese: The frankenbowser loves when you pick it up with your fingers and use all of your muscle to toss it!
Meaning: toss
Hanzi: 抛
Story: Even if you only have nine fingers, you still have the muscle to toss a baseball.
Kind: traditional

從「 手 」，「 𡯄 」聲，本義為丟棄、撇開。《說文新附》：「棄也。从手从尤从力。或从手，𡯄聲。」《後漢書‧安成孝侯賜傳》：「賜與顯子信賣田宅，同拋財產，結客報吏，皆亡命逃伏，遭赦歸。」 「 拋 」可表示投擲。後蜀歐陽炯〈賀明朝〉：「憶昔花間相見後，只憑纖手，暗拋紅豆。」 「 拋 」也表示揮灑。《金瓶梅詞話》第38回：「我着香腮，拋下珠淚來。」 「 拋 」還表示暴露。《封神演義》第3回：「露面拋頭，尸骸殘暴。」 「 拋 」還用作量詞。《儒林外史》第3回：「像你這尖嘴猴腮，也該撒拋尿自己照照！」
From the sound of " hand" and " 𡯄", the original meaning is to discard and put aside. "Shu Wen Xin Fu": "Abandon Ye. From the hand from You Congli. Or from the hand, 𡯄 sound." The guest reporters all fled in desperation and were pardoned." " Toss" can mean toss. Hou Shu Ouyang Jiong (He Mingchao): "After reminiscing in the past, I just tossed the red beans with my bare hands." " Throwing" also means swaying. "Jin Ping Mei Ci Hua" Chapter 38: "I put on my cheeks and cast tears." " Throwing" also means exposure. "The Romance of the Gods" Chapter 3: "Showing up and throwing his head, the corpse is cruel." " Throw" is also used as a quantifier. "The Scholars" Chapter 3: "Like you, a sharp-mouthed monkey cheek, you should also take a picture of yourself by throwing urine!"

拋字的基本解释

拋
pāo
同“抛”。

拋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pāo］
［《廣韻》匹交切，平肴，滂。］
［《廣韻》匹皃切，去效，滂。］
亦作“拋1”。亦作“抱2”。
(1)丢弃；撇开。
(2)扔；投掷。
(3)挥洒。
(4)暴露。
(5)抛售。参见“抛出”。
(6)量词。

拋字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　拋； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页425第03
【唐韻】匹交切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】披交切，?音脬。【說文】棄也。【廣韻】擲也。　又【唐韻】匹貌切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】披敎切，?音砲。義同。　又軍中以機發石曰拋車。【後漢·袁紹傳】曹操發石車擊紹軍中，呼曰霹靂車。【註】卽今拋車也。【唐書·高麗傳】李勣列拋車飛大石，所當輒潰。【集韻】別作?。　又【說文】或从手票聲。通用摽。詳摽字註。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】或作抱。詳抱字註。

拋字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
拋字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［pāo］
["Guangyun" the horses are cross-cut, flat food, poignant. ]
["Guangyun" Pixie cuts, to effect, punishing. ]
Also called "toss 1". Also called "Hug 2".
(1) Discard; set aside.
(2) Throw; throw.
(3) Swish.
(4) Exposure.
(5) Selling. See "throw".
(6) Quantifiers.
